Package model.persistence.clientale

Class ClientBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.persistence.clientale.ClientBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broker

    public class ClientBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker
    An implementation of the abstract class that regulates how the client RandomAccessFile database is accessed by the GUI ClientScreen.
    Author:
    767110

                                java.lang.String search,
                                java.lang.String method)
        Method to search for the client id , type and name, and returns all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        myLsit - ArrayList to contain all clients found.
        search - search parameter of client id
        method - Method to reflect ("getId", "getClienType", "getLastName")
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all clients found.

      • searchById

        public long searchById​(long id)
        Method to locate a Client record in the RandomAccessFile given the id of the Client item to find.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Client to locate
        Returns:
        the byte offset from the beginning of the RandomAccessFile or -1 if no match is found.
